document_data.name: Myconid Pie
document_data.mainbody: '''Myconid pie''' was an aptly-named variety of [[Duergar]] pie made, presumably, using the flesh of [[myconid]]s.
document_data.Availability: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], expensive {{SI|2|lb|k|long=yes}} servings of myconid pie were sold by [[Gorstaf]], a rude duergar baker from the city of [[Gracklstugh]] in the [[Underdark]] in [[northwest Faer√ªn]]. Gorstaf claimed that myconid pies were for those willing to "take their health in their own hands."
